com.github.ruleant.getback_gps

Class LocationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.app.Service
          • com.github.ruleant.getback_gps.LocationService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, SensorOrientation.OrientationEventListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class LocationService
extends android.app.Service
implements SensorOrientation.OrientationEventListener
    Location Service provides the current location. This service will connect to the Location Provider and retrieves the current location
